Package framework.components

Class CardLayout

java.lang.Object
framework.components.JSContainer
framework.components.CardLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable
public class CardLayout
extends JSContainer
Simple card layout component
Contains convenient methods to stack containers over other containers and show one at a time.
Author:
Kureem Rossaye

    • next

      public CardLayoutItem next​(jsweet.lang.Object... params)
      Activates the next CardLayoutItem of this container, and setting the specified object as payload
      The previous Event will be activated
      will return null and do nothing if currently the last item is active.
      Parameters:
      params - - The payload to set to the next CardLayoutItem being activated
      Returns:
      - The CardLayoutItem being activated.

    • previous

      public CardLayoutItem previous​(jsweet.lang.Object... params)
      Activates the previous CardLayoutItem of this container, and setting the specified object as payload
      will return null and do nothing if currently the first item is active.
      Parameters:
      params - - The payload to set to the next CardLayoutItem being activated
      Returns:
      - The CardLayoutItem being activated.

      public java.lang.String[] advancedEventTypes()
      Overrides:
      advancedEventTypes in class JSContainer
      Returns:

      This method is overridden by more complex components to provide more advanced events mechanisms.
